name: DRAGONBALL BUDOKAI MRC
description: new game for ps2 dragonball in the works for me and goku ssj2. in the game there will be new characters never seen before as pika pikachu fusion buu and super buu and we will also god in the game. there will be a new costume for goku that comes from the world of naruto akatsuki or that of the new character as a saiyan Demon Krypto krypto grown on the planet superman .. there will be lots of news of which I am now speaking of it as new enemies and more.
